title: LF A Semi Serious Ranked Team Bronze+
body:
Hey Im IGN: _**MagenticNinja**_
I am currently B3 (B1 Season 4 (My 1st Season))
Im looking to find some guys to play ranked with and even duo with!
I can play all roles with Mid/Jg being my mains.
Im a fairly decent player as I beat gold players in 1v1's (not that great XD)
So Yea! :P
{{champion:7}}

replies.body: Hey I added you, accept my friend request and maybe we can have a chat
Hey im silver 2 and i like pie

Hey im bronze 2 i am an Adc main im also good at support my IGN is : Undefined Power
I was taught how to play by my friend that is plat 5 im a  player that works perfectly if i get the peel i need for some champs.
 My main champs are : Vayne, Thresh , Tristana and jinx i also got a penta this morning with vayne :P thanks for taking your time to read this and peace !
